Time in a Bottle.name: Time in a Bottle
Time in a Bottle.blurb: Zilean stores time as Experience. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives. Cannot be used in combat.
Time in a Bottle.description: Innate: Zilean generates  2 / 3.5 / 5 / 6 / 12 (based on level) experience (does not count towards level up) every 5 seconds. Time in a Bottle is on cooldown when the game starts.
Time in a Bottle.description2: When the amount stored is enough to level up an allied champion and Zilean has been out of combat for the last 10 seconds, he can right-click the target ally to initiate a 1 second  channel (if interrupted, Time in a Bottle goes on a 2 second  cooldown).
Time in a Bottle.description3: A successful channel levels up the target and grants Zilean the stored amount as  experience of his own.
Time in a Bottle.notes:
* Time in a Bottle marks allies with two circles around their feet; the inner one represents how close they are to leveling up, turning golden when able to activate Time in a Bottle on them.
 The target ally is not required to be out of combat to be leveled up by Time in a Bottle - only Zilean is.
 Zilean only consumes the amount of  experience required to level up an ally. He retains the excess for later use.

Time Bomb.name: Time Bomb
Time Bomb.blurb: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.
Time Bomb.description: Active: Zilean throws a ticking time bomb to the target location that detonates after 3 seconds, dealing  magic damage to all surrounding enemies.
Time Bomb.description2: Time Bomb will attach itself to units hit directly, or those who move within a small radius of its center while it's on the ground, detonating at their location when the duration ends.
Time Bomb.description3: Time Bomb detonates immediately if another one attaches itself to the same unit, briefly  stunning all affected enemies.
Time Bomb.notes:
* Time Bombs landing directly on top of multiple units follow a priority order for whom to attach themselves to.
 Units already carrying a bomb
 Enemy champions
 Allied champions
 Enemy minions
 Allied minions

 Time Bombs will detonate immediately if their holder dies.
 Time Bombs enter stealth if the ally they attach themselves to does so.
 Placing the Time Bomb triggers in-combat effects such as drawing turret aggro and applying  Elixir of Sorcery and  Sudden Impact.
 Zilean can detonate an enemy counterpart's Time Bomb by placing his own on the same unit (the first bomb still deals damage).
 Time Bomb will be removed if the holder dies and is revived ( Guardian Angel,  Chronoshift) before it explodes.
 Time Bomb can deal damage to the holder through  untargetablility.
 Time Bomb is one of the few abilities in the game that doesn't have linear scaling damage.

Rewind.name: Rewind
Rewind.blurb: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.
Rewind.description: Active: Zilean reduces  Time Bomb's and  Time Warp's  cooldowns by 10 seconds each.
Rewind.notes:
*  Rewind cannot be ranked up at level 1 (essentially useless at that point).
 Rewind can only be cast when either  Time Bomb or  Time Warp is on cooldown.

Time Warp.name: Time Warp
Time Warp.blurb: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Movement Speed or increasing an ally's Movement Speed for a short time.
Time Warp.description: Active: Zilean bends time around the target champion,  slowing enemies for 2.5 seconds or granting allies  bonus movement speed for the same duration.

Chronoshift.name: Chronoshift
Chronoshift.blurb: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.
Chronoshift.description: Active: Zilean places a protective time rune on the target ally champion or himself, lasting for 5 seconds.
Chronoshift.description2: If the target takes fatal damage during that time, they are put in  stasis for 3 seconds and then  revived, regaining a set amount of  health.
Chronoshift.notes:
* Chronoshift will not trigger if the target is killed by the Nexus Obelisk.
 Chronoshift takes precedence over all other revive effects ( Guardian Angel,  Rebirth).
